reviews.text: 50cl can.Thhick white head.  Clear amber pour. little bitterness in the aftertaste.  Ok

Iâd drink this over the XXXX Bitter any day of the week, and for a mainstream low ABV beer itâs not a total disaster. Darkish golden hue; very safe looking. Non-descript stale malts and adjunct nose. Er...not much else. Similar to taste although as expected not much malt or flavour weight.  Quite crip and dry, probably a good approach given itâs mid-strength intentions, and an ok mild sliver of bitterness to finish.
75cl bottle shared, courtesy of Worldbeertaste @ Deanâs Birthday tasting.Thin white head. Slightly sour. Ok
